meanings.sent1: The child's hyperactivity made it challenging for him to sit still in class.
meanings.sent2: Her hyperactivity was evident as she ran around the playground with endless energy.
meanings.sent3: The hyperactivity of the puppy was entertaining to watch as it zoomed around the yard.
meanings.sent4: The hyperactivity of the city streets during rush hour resembled a beehive of activity.
meanings.sent5: The hyperactivity of the squirrel gathering nuts was a sight to behold in the park.

meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the child with hyperactivity after observing his behavior.
meanings.sent2: Her hyperactivity was a challenge for her parents to manage on a daily basis.
meanings.sent3: The hyperactivity of the kitten was adorable as it pounced on every moving object.
meanings.sent4: The hyperactivity of the market reflected the bustling nature of the city.
meanings.sent5: The hyperactivity of the bees in the hive was a sign of their industriousness.
